item.title: Introduction to BRAIN
item.description: Introduction to Alphas # For official materials, click here Equity long-short market neutral strategy Goal: minimize exposure to the market in general, and profit from a change in the spread between two stocks 1. Inside simulation # Key settings: Delay, Decay When you click “simulate” Step 1: Evaluate the expression for each stock to generate the alpha vector for the given date. Step 2: From each value in the vector, subtract the average of the vector values in the group.
